issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Make sql_statement_to_plan public
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9691](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9691). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There have been some changes to SQL parsing from the upgrade to the latest version of the sql parser crate and we need to make one sql_statement_to_plan public so that other crates can continue to delegate to DataFusion to convert sql statements to logical plans.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9691?focusedCommentId=17175943) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7930
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7930>
